dmca.title: Harvard Requests That Image Be Removed
dmca.body:
The copyrighted work at issue is the photo that appears on http://unsuitablegal.blogspot.com/2007/05/ennis-naunihal-singh-notre-dame.html

The photo in question is the following: 
http://www.hno.harvard.edu/gazette/1999/05.20/photos/singh.200x139.jpg

FROM: 
[Private]
Associate Director, Photography 
Harvard University News Office 
1350 Massachusetts Avenue 
Cambridge, MA 02138 
T: [Private]
F: [Private]
C: [Private]
[Private]@harvard.edu 
AIM: [Private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

[Private]
